title: Open Syndrome Nipah Like Illness

values.name: history of raised temperature prior to hospitalization

references.citation: Satter SM, Aquib WR, Sultana S, Sharif AR, Nazneen A, et al. (2023) Tackling a global epidemic threat: Nipah surveillance in Bangladesh, 2006–2021. PLOS Neglected Tropical Diseases 17(9): e0011617.

human_readable_definition:
Fever (axillary temperature > 38.5 °C) or history of raised temperature prior to hospitalization AND any sign/symptom of brain pathology
OR
Fever (axillary temperature > 38.5 °C) or history of raised temperature prior to hospitalization AND any sign/symptom of lung pathology
